Paragraph: OBJECTIVE : To report a case of methicillin - sensitive Staphylococcus aureus ( MSSA ) bacteremia with suspected MSSA meningitis treated with high - dose daptomycin assessed with concurrent serum and cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) concentrations .

| MSSA meningitis |

2. MSSA meningitis

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: OBJECTIVE : To report a case of methicillin - sensitive Staphylococcus aureus ( MSSA ) bacteremia with suspected MSSA meningitis treated with high - dose daptomycin assessed with concurrent serum and cerebrospinal fluid ( CSF ) concentrations .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| methicillin |
| Staphylococcus aureus (MSSA) |
| daptomycin |

Explanation:

1. methicillin - a type of antibiotic
2. Staphylococcus aureus (MSSA) - a type of bacterium, specifically methicillin-sensitive Staphylococcus aureus
3. daptomycin - an antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections

| Chemical |

| methicillin |

2. daptomycin - an antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections

Note: I have removed "Staphylococcus aureus (MSSA)" as it is a bacterial species and not a chemical.
